item.title: A little bit about me
item.description:
Hello world!

I’m Cris; a Spanish in love with London, where I’ve been living since 2013. Although I had always enjoyed creative tasks as drawing and painting; I opted for a more technical career and I absolutely love it! I am passionate about solving problems, coding and the feel when something you have built actually works!

I love games and I’ve recently started a PhD in Intelligent Games and Games Intelligence (IGGI) in the University of Essex, which I’m really excited about! I also like travelling, music, TV series, cinema and discovering new places in the city. Random facts are that I like medieval stuff (specially swords!) and my chosen superpower would be teleportation.

You might be wondering why the name of the siteâ€¦ Well, cheese can be added to anything and everything tastes better with cheese so it was perfect adding it to my personal site as well!

Thanks for reading!
